short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that converts text to lifelike speech. Listen to web pages and documents with a click, enhancing accessibility

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read Speaker Pro is a powerful Chrome app for natural text-to-speech conversion. 
- With an intuitive interface and advanced speech synthesis technology, Read Speaker Pro allows users to easily listen to any text content on a web page, document or selected text with just one click. . Whether it's articles, emails, online resources or study materials, our apps provide a convenient and easy way to access information. 
- Customize voice, speed, and volume to match your preferences and experience a convenient way to access information and enhance productivity.
- Support GPT chatbot to help users look up, chat and exchange information easily
